name: Blockstep
description:
This game was made by Sorbet Coco for the ludum dare 42 (theme = Running out of space) was our first experience with unity and with game jam.

BlockStep is a 1v1 game and you may play with two controller otherwise you can one controller and keyboard and mouse but this setting is deprecated (w,a,s,d for char mooves ,left click to break block and right one to place,  q,e,r,t for change blockAttack shape).

Have Fun, feel free to give us a feedback ;)
